amendment.description: An amendment numbered 76 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase and decrease funding for the National Instant Criminal Background Check System (NICS) by $5 million in order to encourage states to continue to improve their criminal and mental records for the National Instant Criminal Background Check System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Neguse.
